Class AcceptanceStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.anac.y2013.MetaAgent.portfolio.thenegotiatorreloaded.AcceptanceStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded

    public abstract class AcceptanceStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class for the agents acceptance strategy.
